item.title: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film underwhelms on first day in India - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film underwhelms on first day in India

Updated on Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Game Changer had a disappointing start at the Indian box office, collecting an approximate of Rs. 60 crore on its first day, which is considered underwhelming given the expectations set by its massive budget.

  • The film grossed Rs. 59.50 crore on its opening day.
  • Collections in Telugu states were below expectations, significantly lower than the targeted Rs. 60-65 crore.
  • The Hindi version performed the best with Rs. 7 crore NETT.
  • Low occupancy rates were observed with less than 50% in regular shows.
  • The performance was notably poor in Tamil Nadu and Kerala, traditionally strong markets for director Shankar.
“A little salt blends well with flour,” but here the salt is probably more than flour.

This lackluster performance raises questions about the film's future at the box office, given the high expectations set by its marketing and budget.

item.title: Report: Prabhas’ The Raja Saab gets postponed - 123telugu
item.description:
Prabhas’ The Raja Saab gets postponed

Published on Jan 11, 2025

The upcoming film featuring Prabhas, The Raja Saab, has reportedly been postponed from its initial release date of April 10, 2025. The horror comedy, directed by Maruthi, is currently in its final production stages.

  • The Raja Saab is a horror comedy romantic entertainer.
  • Initial release was set for April 10, 2025, but may not be met.
  • The reason for the delay has not been disclosed.
  • A special poster is expected to be unveiled for Sankranthi.
  • Co-stars include Malavika Mohanan and Niddhi Agerwal.
  • Produced by People Media Factory with music by Thaman.
“An official confirmation from the team will make things clear.”

This postponement has led to increased speculation, especially following the announcement of another film set to release on the same date.

item.title: After Kalki 2898 AD, Jai Hanuman lands in trouble - 123telugu
item.description:
Jai Hanuman Faces Legal Trouble Over Controversial Teaser

Published on Jan 11, 2025

The upcoming film Jai Hanuman is facing backlash due to allegations of misrepresenting Lord Hanuman in its teaser. As legal troubles mount, the producers have yet to respond.

  • A Hyderabad lawyer filed a petition against the makers of Jai Hanuman.
  • The teaser allegedly disrespects Lord Hanuman's image.
  • The production company, Mythri Movie Makers, has not issued a comment yet.
  • Jai Hanuman is a sequel to the successful film Hanu-Man.
“The teaser could mislead future generations about Lord Hanuman’s image,” claimed advocate Tirumala Rao.

This controversy highlights the scrutiny faced by mythological films in India, especially regarding their portrayals of religious figures.

item.title: Karan Johar wears 'nepo baby' T-shirt during dinner with Gauri Khan, Malaika Arora; internet says: It's really on point - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Karan Johar wore 'nepo baby' T-shirt during dinner with Gauri Khan, Malaika Arora; internet says: It's really on point

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Karan Johar garnered attention for wearing a T-shirt that read 'nepo baby' during a dinner outing with friends Gauri Khan and Malaika Arora.

  • Karan wore a full-sleeved white T-shirt with black trousers and sneakers.
  • The dinner took place in Mumbai and was captured on social media.
  • Internet reactions highlighted the pride in Karan's choice of attire, with comments like 'Finally, wearing his Nepo Baby shirt proudly.'
  • In addition to his T-shirt, Karan has been active in the fashion scene, walking the ramp at events.
  • Karan is set to direct a new series for Netflix India and has several films in production.
'Lol, Kjo's top is really on point haan (yes). He's proud to be a new baby.'

In conclusion, Karan Johar's casual yet bold fashion choice sparked a lively discussion on social media, reflecting the ongoing cultural conversation around 'nepo babies' in the film industry.

item.title: Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan-starrer surpasses Vinaya Vidheya Rama but couldn’t overtake RRR, earns Rs 51.25 cr - The Indian Express
item.description:
Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan-starrer earns Rs 186 crore worldwide, claim makers

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

S Shankar’s highly anticipated film, Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has taken a strong opening at the box office, with a reported collection of Rs 186 crore worldwide on its first day.

  • Game Changer has grossed Rs 51.25 crore in India.
  • The film's collections include Rs 42 crore in Telugu, Rs 2.1 crore in Tamil, Rs 7 crore in Hindi, along with smaller amounts in Kannada and Malayalam.
  • The movie achieved a morning occupancy rate of 51.32% for the Telugu version and an 82% occupancy for its 4DX Hindi version afternoon shows.
  • This opening surpassed Ram Charan’s last solo film, Vinaya Vidheya Rama, which earned Rs 34 crore on its opening day.
  • Despite its success, it did not match the Day 1 collection of RRR, which opened at Rs 133 crore.
The king’s arrival is setting the box office ablaze 🤙🏼 #GameChanger takes a blockbuster opening at the BOX OFFICE 💥💥 GROSSES 186 CRORES WORLDWIDE on Day 1 ❤‍🔥

Director S Shankar hopes to capitalize on this success as his previous film, Indian 2, opened at Rs 25.6 crore.

The film features Ram Charan in a dual role, with Kiara Advani as his love interest. Game Changer is expected to maintain its momentum through the weekend, especially after a dry spell in box office hits.

item.title: Fateh box office collection day 1: Sonu Sood's directorial debut opens at ₹2.45 cr - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 1: Sonu Sood's Directorial Debut Opens at ₹2.45 Cr

Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Soon to be a notable directorial debut for actor Sonu Sood, the film Fateh managed to collect ₹2.45 crore on its opening day, facing competition from the Telugu blockbuster Game Changer.

  • Fateh opened well with a collection of ₹2.45 crore on its first day.
  • The film competes with Game Changer, which earned ₹7 crore on its opening day.
  • Tickets were priced at ₹99 for the first day as part of an initiative to reach the common man.
  • All profits from the film will be donated to charity by Sonu Sood.
  • Fateh is based on real-life instances of cybercrime experienced during the COVID-19 pandemic.
“Fateh is a film made for the common man, and I wanted it to reach everyone in the most accessible way across India.” - Sonu Sood

The opening day collection shows promise, and the film's strategy of affordable tickets may boost attendance. With a gripping narrative around cybercrime, Fateh aims to resonate with audiences nationwide.

item.title: Prabhas Getting Married? Trade Analyst Drops BIG Hint, Leaves Fans Excited - News18
item.description:
Prabhas Getting Married? Trade Analyst Drops BIG Hint, Leaves Fans Excited

Published on: January 11, 2025, 14:43 IST | Source: News18

Looks like Telugu star Prabhas is getting married. Recently, trade analyst Manobala Vijayabalan posted a cryptic tweet hinting at a wedding, prompting speculation among fans.

  • Fans are reacting excitedly to the trade analyst's post about Prabhas potentially getting married.
  • There is speculation regarding Prabhas's relationship with his Baahubali co-star Anushka Shetty.
  • Previous rumors of his marriage were dismissed by Prabhas during an event, where he stated he doesn't want to hurt his female fans.
“I am not getting married soon because I don’t want to hurt the feelings of my female fans,” - Prabhas

The rumors surrounding Prabhas's marriage have sparked significant interest and discussion among fans, as they eagerly await any confirmation.

item.title: After Game Changer, Daaku Maharaaj faces this obstacle - 123telugu
item.description:
After Game Changer, Daaku Maharaaj Faces This Obstacle

Published on Jan 11, 2025 9:53 am IST

With the release of Game Changer starring Ram Charan, delays have impacted both Game Changer and the upcoming film Daaku Maharaaj.

  • Game Changer had several USA premiere shows cancelled due to delays, resulting in a loss of nearly $100K.
  • Daaku Maharaaj, starring Balakrishna, is facing similar delivery delays that are affecting premiere shows.
  • The ambitious project aims for a 2 million dollar collection, but initial losses are anticipated due to these delays.
  • If the film content is well received, it could recover in the long run.
"Due to this, the premiere collections will be affected to an extent."

This situation highlights the challenges faced by the Telugu film industry amid logistical issues but also underscores the potential for recovery based on audience reception.

item.title: Fateh Review: The No-Nonsense, Unabashed And Ultra-Violent Film Is Surprisingly Watchable - NDTV Movies
item.description:
Fateh Review: The No-Nonsense, Unabashed And Ultra-Violent Film Is Surprisingly Watchable

Publication Date: New Delhi

An ex-special ops agent embarks on a violent rampage to take down cyber criminals behind a fraudulent loan operation. Actor Sonu Sood makes his writing and directing debut with a film that is unapologetically violent and dynamic.

  • The film opens with an intense confrontation where the protagonist, Fateh Singh, takes control by resorting to extreme violence.
  • Fateh utilizes a variety of weapons in his mission against a network of cyber criminals, showcasing high body counts reminiscent of other action-packed films.
  • The narrative includes a social purpose, focusing on the impact of a scam targeting financially vulnerable individuals.
  • Despite the relentless violence, the film offers minimal mystery as the antagonist's identity is revealed early on.
  • Sonu Sood's performance resonates with the film's gritty tone, although other characters struggle to stand out in the chaos.
“Fateh is marked by dizzying momentum if not sustained clarity.”

In conclusion, while Fateh may be overwhelming with its sheer brutality, it remains a captivating watch for those who appreciate action-packed narratives.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 37: Allu Arjun starrer begins 6th weekend with Rs 1.15 crore earning - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 37: Allu Arjun Starrer Begins 6th Weekend with Rs 1.15 Crore Earning

Publication Date: [not specified] Source: [not specified]

Pushpa 2 continues to perform strongly at the box office, beginning its 6th weekend with earnings of Rs 1.15 crore.

  • After 37 days in theaters, the film shows remarkable box office resilience.
  • It maintained a steady audience turnout over the weeks.
  • The total earnings have significantly boosted the film's financial success.
“The film’s success is a testament to Allu Arjun’s popularity and the movie's strong storyline.”

The continued box office strength of Pushpa 2 demonstrates its lasting appeal and the effectiveness of its marketing strategy.

item.title: Karan Johar's leaner look shocks fans as he and Sidharth Malhotra walk the ramp in plunging-neck suits - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Karan Johar's leaner look shocks fans as he and Sidharth Malhotra walk the ramp in plunging-neck suits

Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

At a recent fashion show in Mumbai, Karan Johar and Sidharth Malhotra showcased stunning outfits, with Karan's surprising transformation stealing the spotlight.

  • Karan Johar walked the ramp in an all-white ensemble, featuring a silk shirt and a matching long coat.
  • Sidharth Malhotra was the showstopper in a fitted navy blue suit with a plunging V neckline.
  • Karan's leaner appearance drew mixed reactions from fans online.
“He looks so skinny.”

Overall, the fashion show combined high-style moments with intriguing celebrity appearances.

item.title: Aamir Khan on why he quit smoking ahead of son Junaid Khan's film release: ‘Maine apne dil mein mannat maangi’. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aamir Khan Quits Smoking Ahead of Son Junaid Khan's Film Release

Jan 11, 2025 from Hindustan Times

Aamir Khan has announced that he has quit smoking after years of heavy consumption. This announcement was made during the trailer launch of his son Junaid Khan's film, Loveyapa, in Mumbai.

  • Aamir Khan reveals he has quit smoking.
  • He expresses his love for smoking but acknowledges its health risks.
  • He encourages others to quit smoking as well.
  • He attributes his decision partly to his son’s debut film and his desire to set a good example.
  • Junaid Khan's film Loveyapa is set to release on February 7, following his previous debut in a Netflix film.
“I have given up smoking, smoking is something I love very much... it’s not good for health. No one should do it.”

The actor’s decision comes as he wishes to support his son in his new career path while also prioritizing his health.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection Day 1: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani starrer makes a splash with Rs 51 c - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan and Kiara Advani Starrer Makes a Splash

Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Ram Charan and Kiara Advani's film 'Game Changer' had an impressive start, grossing Rs 51 crore on its opening day, and Rs 7 crore from Hindi audiences.

  • The film received a positive response from audiences and critics alike.
  • It marks a significant debut for the lead actors in their respective careers.
  • The box office numbers indicate strong word-of-mouth promotion.
"A fantastic start, signaling a strong presence in the upcoming weeks!" - Film Analyst

The film's early success hints at a promising run and potential for record-breaking collections in the following days.

item.title: WWE SmackDown Results – 1/10/25 (United States Championship Matches, Tiffany Stratton) - Wrestleview.com
item.description:
WWE SmackDown Results

Date: January 10, 2025
Source: Wrestleview.com

On January 10, 2025, WWE SmackDown featured several high-stakes matches including United States Championship bouts and a significant storyline involving Cody Rhodes, Roman Reigns, and Kevin Owens.

  • The night began with Tiffany Stratton, the new WWE Women’s Champion.
  • Paul Heyman introduced Roman Reigns, announcing his entry into the 2025 Men’s Royal Rumble.
  • Cody Rhodes and Kevin Owens had a tense confrontation, escalating to a physical altercation.
  • WWE Women’s United States Championship saw Chelsea Green successfully defend her title against Michin.
  • LA Knight faced Shinsuke Nakamura for the United States Championship, resulting in a disqualification victory for Knight, while Nakamura retained his title.
  • The Motor City Machine Guns secured a victory against A-Town Down Under.
A very good start to #SmackDown. Roman Reigns being in the Royal Rumble for the first time in years, Cody Rhodes and Kevin Owens, Jacob Fatu and Tama Tonga. It's an interesting start.— Wrestleview.com

The show ended with drama and setup for future high-profile matches.

item.title: Fateh box office collection Day 1: Sonu Sood starrer off to a slow start with Rs 2.45 crore debut - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 1: Sonu Sood Starrer Off to a Slow Start with Rs 2.45 Crore Debut

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: Times of India

The much-anticipated action film Fateh, featuring Sonu Sood, opened to a subdued box office collection of Rs 2.45 crore on its first day.

  • The film revolves around themes of cybercrime, justice, and resilience.
  • Initial predictions estimated the film's first-day collection to be between Rs 70 lakh and Rs 1 crore.
  • Sood's return as a lead actor was highly anticipated, especially after his philanthropic work during the pandemic.
  • Fateh faces tough competition from major releases such as Ram Charan's Game Changer and Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2.
  • Industry experts suggest that positive word-of-mouth may improve the film's performance over the weekend.
  • Salman Khan showed support for Fateh, connecting it with a song he previously contributed to.
“I also have a contribution in the film Fateh. The song 'Heer' was very dear to me, but now it is part of this film.” - Salman Khan

As the weekend progresses, the success of 'Fateh' is dependent on audience response and critical reception.

item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, January 11, 2025

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Today offers new opportunities for Pisces to grow personally and professionally, fostering meaningful connections and inspiring creative ideas.

  • Opportunities for growth and self-discovery in personal and professional spheres.
  • Focus on nurturing relationships; great day for expressing feelings.
  • Creative inspiration is high, encouraging innovative ideas at work.
  • Financial stability with opportunities for wise investments.
  • Maintain a balanced lifestyle focusing on health and well-being.
“Your emotional health is just as important, so ensure you're taking time for activities that bring you joy and relaxation.”

In summary, today promises a fruitful day for Pisces, emphasizing personal and professional growth alongside relationship enhancement.

Today promises personal growth and new opportunities. Embrace positive changes, maintain open communication, and focus on self-care to navigate any challenges.

item.description:

Today presents growth opportunities in love and career, encouraging openness and focus for the best outcomes.

  • Personal growth is highlighted, especially in love and career.
  • Communication is crucial for enhancing relationships, whether single or in a relationship.
  • Career opportunities arise; collaboration is key to success.
